alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:17AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN CITRUS...SUMTER...PASCO AND HERNANDO COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM EDT... At 1016 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weeki Wachee Gardens, or 9 miles north of Hudson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Inverness, Wildwood, Dade City, Bushnell, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Holiday, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, Inverness Airport, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport, and Wesley Chapel South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
